Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.handlers

Oauth 2.0 response handlers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthorizationResponseHandler
    Handles Oauth 2.0 Authorization responses.
    CookieSuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandlerConfiguration
    Configuration for CookieSuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler.
    ErrorResponseHandler
    Handles Oauth 2.0 Error responses.
    IdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Handle a IdTokenAccessTokenResponse.
    NotValidIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Handle a not valid IdTokenAccessTokenResponse.
    SuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Handle a valid IdTokenAccessTokenResponse.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CookieSuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Default implementation of SuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler.
    CookieSuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandlerConfigurationProperties
    ConfigurationProperties implementation of CookieSuccessfulIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandlerConfiguration.
    DefaultAuthorizationResponseHandler
    Default implementation of AuthorizationResponseHandler.
    DefaultErrorResponseHandler
    Default implementation of ErrorResponseHandler.
    DefaultIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Validates a IdTokenAccessTokenResponse and creates an HTTP Response.
    DefaultNotValidIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler
    Default implementation of NotValidIdTokenAccessTokenResponseHandler.
    OpenIdUnauthorizedRejectionUriProvider
    Provides an implementation of UnauthorizedRejectionUriProvider to redirect to the authorization url provide by AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider.

Package io.micronaut.security.oauth2.handlers Description

Oauth 2.0 response handlers.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo
